body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting Richardson Hotels customer support. My name is Brandon Richardson.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: May I kindly ask for your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Ruth Green.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Ruth! Can you please provide me with your date of birth?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my date of birth is the eighth of October nineteen eighty-four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Ruth. Could you also share with me the last four digits of your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, the last four digits of my phone number are seven eight nine zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, I have noted down your details, Ruth. Is there anything else you would like to share or ask today?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Ruth! If you have any further questions, feel free to reach out. Have a wonderful day!
